name: Executioner Sword
description:
Sword designed specifically for decapitation in gruesome rituals

Boosts damage by 30% when near death

name: Health Amulet
description:
Golden amulet with red jewel imbued in magic

Grants 1 additional live

name: Mana Ring
description:
Golden Ring with blue jewel imbued in magic

Grants 10% more mana

name: Idol of Haste
description:
Small totem of long forgotten god of haste carved from magic wood

Boosts movement speed by 25%

name: Coward's Sword
description:
Said to be worn by the most cowardly fighters across the land

Boosts damage by 10% while on full lives
